item.title: Ignore whitespace on Git diffs
item.description: By default, git’s diff (git diff or on Github) show whitespace changes as well as meaningful changes. To suppress them in git diff, add the -b flag: git diff -b To suppress on github.com, append ?w=1 to any diff’s URL.
